website_summaries.verdict: A bigger, sharper screen and thinner bezels make the Pixel 2 XL the more desirable Google phone, but some early units have been dogged by screen issues.
pros: The Pixel 2 XL perks up the already excellent Pixel 2 with more screen space
It has a fantastic camera, waterproofing and the Google Lens feature that helps you learn more about the world around you
cons: The camera's Portrait Mode doesn't work as smoothly as its competitors' dual camera
Its battery doesn't last as long as others in its caliber and the phone has no headphone jack or wireless charging
The displays on some handsets have irksome screen problems

customer_reviews.title: VERY BAD PHONE.
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone 1 year ago it was from the start not a good phone the battery would not make it a day with light use the screen was one of the worst i have seen on a phone about 1 month ago i dropped the pixel 2 xl with a case on it from 1 foot high on carpet an it shattered very weak screen dont waste your money on this phone 0 stars if i could.
customer_reviews.author: The prophecy

customer_reviews.title: Screen size is great and screen feels awesome. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me in Ghana, Africa. Love the design! Update. Besides the beautiful screen, screen size and design, everything about this phone is disappointing. The phone's battery life is shockingly weak. For regular usage, the phone has be charged at least 2 times daily. Also, it has some of the worst ringtones and sadly, it doesn't give any options to upload external ringtones. I'd return this phone if it hadn't crossed the Atlantic.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: The phone arrived a day earlier than expected which was nice. It is in good condition for a used phone with no scratches on the screen, it does have a few small chips in the paint, but again, for a used phone it is in really good condition. I was easily able to get it activated, and have noticed no problems with the phone after a few days of regular use. I would definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used (barely) and it works great. Looks and works like new!! The battery life is pretty good but the camera quality is tops!!! The best phone camera I have ever used bar none!! I don't use the fingerprint sensor so I can't really comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my purchase. The phone came in perfect condition and after charging it was ready to go once I transferred my data over. I was nervous after reading some of the reviews but I could not be happier. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Rio runs through it

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit afraid that I wouldn't get the right product but I'm so happy that I got it. It is the authentic google pixel 2 at a great price :)
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Dislike how slow it load's, I believe I got a damaged phone also charge doesn't last for more than 3 hours shame on the seller who would ship this piece of crap to a paying customer 🤬 very upsetting and disappointed I would not recommend this phone to anyone !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone.
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok. Great camera. It would not communicate with my car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good battery, great camera, quality phone.
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good buy. kudos to the seller for accurate description. the device is a perfect modern phone for daily usage
customer_reviews.author: lawson kings

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: phone has some clear scratches in the edges, it is hard used phone, but all functions working very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Mostafa Mahgoop Mostafa

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I have been around the world and back trying to decide between the pixel 2xl and the 3xl and I finally got the 2xl after reading tons of reviews. And let me tell you I love it. The only thing that I was surprised about was the size. I thought it was bigger, but it's a great phone anyway. Super fast, definitely since I upgraded from the first generation pixel XL. I would definitely give this a 5 star, and also it came very new looking. Very little scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Herashianda Arshad

customer_reviews.title: Not as smooth operation as newer model
customer_reviews.text: Although the unit is not the newest model of the Pixel, it, even with the OS updates still lacks the some of the smoother abilities and smoothness of the newer models. However ever, it will suffice for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Device is in pretty much perfect shape. No scratches or dings. It's so snappy.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Daniels

customer_reviews.title: soon to be outdated
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is nearing the end for updates, it is still a really good phone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera and design is timeless/sensational
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great, was going to return it but once it was in my hands I just could not let go of it. Camera quality is sensational (front and rear).
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Lucy

product_meta.title: Google Pixel 2 XL 64GB Unlocked GSM/CDMA 4G LTE Octa-Core Phone w/ 12.2MP Camera - Just Black
product_meta.description: Color:Just Black| Size:64 GBIntroducing the Google Pixel 2 XL. Discover a better way to capture, store, and see the world. Pixel 2 features a smart camera that takes beautiful photos in any light, a fast-charging battery and the Google Assistant built-in. Phone also comes with a 2 year warranty, for peace of mind. Verizon is your destination for the hottest phones like the Google Pixel 2 XL, all on the nation's most reliable 4G LTE network.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories
